title: Chestnut Sellers in Rome
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Jacques-François Amand [1730-1769], Paris, France. From the Sergogne collection. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976.

Notes:
[1]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

Under review by CGK
